description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in index.php in phpBP RC3 (2.204) and earlier allows remote administrators to inject arbitrary PHP code into an upload/banners/ file via a banners add operation that uploads the PHP code through an image_form parameter specifying a multiple-extension filename such as .jpg.vil.gif.php, which is stored in upload/banners/ under a different name, and executable via a direct request.  NOTE: a separate SQL injection issue could be leveraged to make this vulnerability reachable by remote unauthenticated attackers.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0466

description: crashdump in Apple Mac OS X 10.4.8 allows local users in the admin group to modify arbitrary files or gain privileges via a symlink attack on application logs in /Library/Logs/CrashReporter/.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0467

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in rcdll.dll in msdev.exe in Visual C++ (MSVC) in Microsoft Visual Studio 6.0 SP6 allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long file path in the "1 TYPELIB MOVEABLE PURE" option in an RC file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0468

description: The extract_files function in installer.rb in RubyGems before 0.9.1 does not check whether files exist before overwriting them, which allows user-assisted remote attackers to overwrite arbitrary files, cause a denial of service, or execute arbitrary code via crafted GEM packages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0469

description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in tip in Sun Solaris 8, 9, and 10 allow local users to gain uucp account privileges via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0470

description: sre/params.php in the Integrity Clientless Security (ICS) component in Check Point Connectra NGX R62 3.x and earlier before Security Hotfix 5, and possibly VPN-1 NGX R62, allows remote attackers to bypass security requirements via a crafted Report parameter, which returns a valid ICSCookie authentication token.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0471

description: The gencert.sh script, when installing OpenLDAP before 2.1.30-r10, 2.2.x before 2.2.28-r7, and 2.3.x before 2.3.30-r2 as an ebuild in Gentoo Linux, does not create temporary directories in /tmp securely during emerge, which allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0476

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Openads 2.0.x before 2.0.10, 2.3 before 2.3.31 (aka Max Media Manager before 0.3.31-alpha-pr2), and phpAdsNew/phpPgAds before 2.0.9-pr1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) the keyword parameter in admin-search.php and (2) affiliate-search.php. NOTE: this issue may overlap CVE-2007-0363.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0477

description: WebCore on Apple Mac OS X 10.3.9 and 10.4.10, as used in Safari, does not properly parse HTML comments in TITLE elements, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and bypass some XSS protection schemes by embedding certain HTML tags within an HTML comment.

description: Memory leak in the TCP listener in Cisco IOS 9.x, 10.x, 11.x, and 12.x allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service by sending crafted TCP traffic to an IPv4 address on the IOS device.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0479

description: Cisco IOS 9.x, 10.x, 11.x, and 12.x and IOS XR 2.0.x, 3.0.x, and 3.2.x allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via a crafted IP option in the IP header in a (1) ICMP, (2) PIMv2, (3) PGM, or (4) URD packet.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0480

description: Cisco IOS allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted IPv6 Type 0 Routing header.

description: cgi-bin/main in Sun Ray Server Software 2.0 and 3.0 before 20070123 allows local users to obtain the utadmin password by reading a web server's log file, or by conducting a different, unspecified local attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0483

description: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in defines.php in WebChat 0.77 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the WEBCHATPATH parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0485

description: ** DISPUTED **  Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in Openads (aka phpAdsNew) 2.0.7 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the (1) phpAds_geoPlugin parameter to libraries/lib-remotehost.inc, the (2) filename parameter to admin/report-index, or the (3) phpAds_config[my_footer] parameter to admin/lib-gui.inc.  NOTE: the vendor has disputed this issue, stating that the relevant variables are used within function definitions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2007-0486

description: ** DISPUTED **  PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in index.php in FreeForum 0.9.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the fpath parameter.
